subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: In the teams’ 250th meeting, the Islanders broke open a 2-2 game early in the third period on a goal by Kyle Okposo and then added three more against Henrik Lundqvist.
snippet: In the teams’ 250th meeting, the Islanders broke open a 2-2 game early in the third period on a goal by Kyle Okposo and then added three more against Henrik Lundqvist.
